title: Teenage Dirtbag
description: Dirtbag Kyle Loman and his friends are socially invisible. Bettina Richards is the polar opposite. When Bettina secretly spies on Kyle doing something remarkable, he becomes anything but invisible in her eyes. Thrown together in Spain for a month, they embark on an unexpected romance. But back at Buffaloâ€™s East McKinley High, their social stratospheres collide. Will first love be enough?
author: Rebecca Montemurro
